#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long int
#define inf 10e17
using namespace std;
lli isPowerOfTwo (lli x)
{
	return ((x != 0) && ((x & (~x + 1)) == x));
}

int main()
{
	lli n, ans = inf;
	cin>>n;
	lli a[n], dp[n];
	for(int i =0; i< n; i++){
		cin>>a[i];
		dp[i]=inf;
	}
	dp[0]=0;
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++){
		ans = inf;
		for(int j =1; i+j<=n ; j=j<<1){
			if(dp[i+j] >( dp[i] + abs(a[i]-a[i+j])))	
			dp[i+j] = dp[i] + abs(a[i]-a[i+j]);	
				//cout<<dp[j]<<"  "<<abs(a[j]-a[i])<<endl;
				//ans = min(ans,dp[j] + abs(a[j]-a[i]));
			
		}
	//	dp[i] = ans;
	}
	cout<<dp[n-1]<<endl;
	return 0;
}
